data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Marusik, Yuri M., Omelko, Mikhail M. (2016): Redescription of Draposa subhadrae (Patel & Reddy, 1993) (Araneae: Lycosidae, Pardosinae). Zootaxa 4107 (1): 89-92, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4107.1.6
